name: Moral Conflict
description:
You're the leader of a large group of vampire refugees, living a life of fleeing and hiding from hateful human soldiers. You have had enough, and seek vengeance on the human king that is responsible for the massacre of your people.

Will you devour the innocents, the wicked, the humans, and the animals?

The lives of many are in the palm of your pale vampiric hand. The choices are yours, and the choices you make will determine your ending, as well as the fates of both your kin and many others.

Gameplay
Moral Conflict is a text-based narrative game, driven by the choices you make and affected by the balance of compassion, willpower, and vampiric essence your character possesses. Make certain choices, and change the fate of your character and the world around you.

Endings
Your choices affect both the story, and your character's attributes such as compassion, and willpower. Different endings will require different choices and approaches to your quest. The final choice will be affected by your character attributes, and will directly affect the end of your journey. Some endings are more satisfying than others, and some may be very difficult to attain.
